name: Malaria's Unyielding Grip
title: High Malaria Incidence
description: In 2023, Benin reported a malaria incidence of 363.4 cases per 1,000 population at risk, one of the highest in the world.

name: Diabetes? Not a Big Deal Here
title: Low Diabetes Prevalence
description: With only 1.1% of its population aged 20 to 79 affected by diabetes in 2021, Benin boasts one of the lowest diabetes prevalence rates globally.

name: Sanitation Struggles
title: Limited Access to Sanitation
description: In 2022, only 2.7% of Benin's population had access to safely managed sanitation services, highlighting significant challenges in public health infrastructure.
